name: Paleto Jones (Amstrad)
description:
THE TOMB OF UNCLE RAMON

-AMSTRAD CPC-

Rescue your uncle kidnapped by an indigenous tribe hidden deep in the jungle. You will have to return all their gold if you want to make your way through their temple and be able to rescue your uncle.

THANKS TO MOJON TWINS FOR THE AMAZING MK1 ENGINE / PESTECERA

THANKS TO AUGUSTO RUIZ FOR WYZ TRACKER & PLAYER

THANKS TO ERIC CUBIZOLLE (TITAN) FOR THE AMAZING LOAD SCREEN

WEB EMULATOR BY FLOOOOH'S CHIPS

All contributions made for this game will go entirely to the  UNHCR (ACNUR)  association to help refugees.
